sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - இளகு, மெதுவாகு, துவளு, ஆற்றப்படு, இளக்கரிக்கப்பண்ணு
to be tender, to be soft, to be weak
1) to be tender, to be weak (of heart)
a) to be timid, to be fearful
b) to be softened, to be penitent
2) to be soft (used of treacherous words)
c) (Hiphil) to cause to be weak
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to soften (intransitively or transitively), used figuratively: - (be) faint ([-hearted]), mollify, (be, make) soft (-er), be tender.
Cognate: H4816, H7390, H7391, H7401
